name: C++ Systems Programming
summary: 14+ years of experience. Focus on modern C++ paradigms (RAII, Move Semantics) to replace legacy 'C with Classes' patterns.

sub_competencies.name: RAII and Memory Safety
sub_competencies.desc: Resource Acquisition Is Initialization pattern to prevent leaks.

sub_competencies.name: Smart Pointers (C++11)
sub_competencies.desc: std::unique_ptr vs std::shared_ptr for ownership semantics.

sub_competencies.name: Move Semantics (C++11)
sub_competencies.desc: rvalue references and std::move to avoid expensive copies.

sub_competencies.name: Lambdas and Generic Lambdas
sub_competencies.desc: Anonymous functions (C++11) and auto parameters (C++14).

sub_competencies.name: std::thread and Atomics
sub_competencies.desc: Multithreading primitives and lock-free programming basics.

sub_competencies.name: Variadic Templates
sub_competencies.desc: Type-safe metaprogramming allowing arbitrary argument counts.

name: Python
summary: Core language proficiency used for backend servers, data pipelines, and automation scripts.

sub_competencies.name: Decorators and Wrappers
sub_competencies.desc: Higher-order functions for modifying behavior (logging, auth).

sub_competencies.name: Generators and Iterators
sub_competencies.desc: Lazy evaluation using 'yield' for memory-efficient loops.

sub_competencies.name: Context Managers
sub_competencies.desc: Custom 'with' statements for resource handling (files, locks).

sub_competencies.name: Dunder Methods
sub_competencies.desc: Operator overloading (__init__, __str__, __add__) for custom classes.

sub_competencies.name: Type Hinting (Mypy)
sub_competencies.desc: Static type checking in modern Python for robustness.

name: Django Framework
summary: Architecting secure web applications and designing scalable technology stacks.

sub_competencies.name: ORM Optimization
sub_competencies.desc: select_related vs prefetch_related to solve N+1 query problems.

sub_competencies.name: Signals and Receivers
sub_competencies.desc: Decoupled event handling (post_save, pre_delete).

sub_competencies.name: Custom Middleware
sub_competencies.desc: Intercepting request/response cycles for logging or auth.

sub_competencies.name: DRF Serializers
sub_competencies.desc: Complex nested serialization and validation logic.

sub_competencies.name: Async Tasks (Celery)
sub_competencies.desc: Offloading heavy tasks to Redis/RabbitMQ workers.

name: React Ecosystem
summary: Building modern, polymorphic user interfaces with focus on component reusability.

sub_competencies.name: Custom Hooks
sub_competencies.desc: Encapsulating logic (e.g., useFetch, useAuth) for reuse.

sub_competencies.name: Context API and Reducers
sub_competencies.desc: Global state management without prop drilling.

sub_competencies.name: Memoization
sub_competencies.desc: useMemo and useCallback to prevent unnecessary re-renders.

sub_competencies.name: Compound Components
sub_competencies.desc: Advanced patterns for flexible UI (Tabs, Accordions).

name: Rust Systems
summary: Exploration of memory-safe systems programming to replace legacy C++ components.

sub_competencies.name: Ownership and Borrowing
sub_competencies.desc: The core memory model: moves, borrows, and slices.

sub_competencies.name: Lifetimes
sub_competencies.desc: Explicit lifetime annotations to ensure reference validity.

sub_competencies.name: Traits and Generics
sub_competencies.desc: Defining shared behavior (Interfaces) and polymorphism.

sub_competencies.name: Enums and Pattern Matching
sub_competencies.desc: Algebraic data types and exhaustive match statements.

sub_competencies.name: Wasm Bindgen
sub_competencies.desc: Exposing Rust functions to JavaScript via WebAssembly.

name: Embedded Systems
summary: Firmware development for proprietary hardware and RTOS environments.

sub_competencies.name: Bit Manipulation
sub_competencies.desc: Bitwise operators, masking, and register interaction.

sub_competencies.name: ISRs (Interrupts)
sub_competencies.desc: Handling hardware interrupts and re-entrancy safety.

sub_competencies.name: Comms Protocols
sub_competencies.desc: I2C, SPI, and UART implementation logic.

sub_competencies.name: Volatile and Memory Mapping
sub_competencies.desc: Preventing compiler optimization for hardware registers.

name: Linux Systems
summary: Deep familiarity with Linux environments for both server administration and embedded development.

sub_competencies.name: Bash Scripting
sub_competencies.desc: Automating system tasks and build pipelines.

sub_competencies.name: Permissions and Security
sub_competencies.desc: Managing users, groups, and chmod/chown logic.

sub_competencies.name: Systemd Services
sub_competencies.desc: Creating custom daemon services for background applications.

name: Cross-Platform Engineering
summary: Architecting build systems that compile a single codebase for multiple targets (Windows, Linux, macOS).
